LanguageData.Armbinder.label: armbinder
LanguageData.Armbinder.description: A high-tech armbinder. It prevents any pawn it's attached to from using their arms.
LanguageData.Gag.label: gag
LanguageData.Gag.description: A high-tech gag. It prevents any pawn it's attached to from talking.
LanguageData.ChastityBelt.label: chastity belt
LanguageData.ChastityBelt.description: A high-tech chastity belt. It prevents sex and masturbation.
